subject: Computers and the Internet
lead_paragraph: When an Internet impostor using Shaquille O’Neal’s name was sending messages to unsuspecting fans, O’Neal did what any sensible, 7-foot-1, muscle-bound mammoth would do. He started tweeting.
snippet: When an Internet impostor using Shaquille O’Neal’s name was sending messages to unsuspecting fans, O’Neal did what any sensible, 7-foot-1, muscle-bound mammoth would do. He started tweeting.
